miic.core.corr_fun.norm_corr_stream¶

norm_corr_stream(st, unit_measure=3600)[source]¶

Normalization of the correlation traces to the selected unit_measure

This function normalizes the correlation traces in the input stream by a factor that takes into account exactly how long was the noise record that has been used to generate the correlation traces. The traces are dived by this length and multiplied to correspond to a length unit_measure that is, by default, equal to one hour.

Parameters:
  • st – Stream that contains the traces that must be normalized
  • unit_measure (int) – Unit measure respect which normalize the traces (in sec)
Return type:

class:~obspy.core.stream.Stream

Returns:

st_norm : Normalized stream
